did.unittitle: Seventh annual oplatek, December 30, 2012 : St. Colette Catholic Chuch, Livonia, Michigan.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: At head of title : West Side Detroit Polish American Historical Society (WSDPAHS)

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "Memory CD"--Disc label. Item is a DVD.

archdesc.scopecontent: Slide show depicting members of the Metropolitan Detroit, Mich. Polish community, clergy, churches, and social events. The slide show is accompanied by acoustic guitar music.
